name: react-simple-qr-code-scanner
description: A super simple qr code scanner

scripts.publish:beta: pnpm i && nx build react-simple-qr-code-scanner && npm publish ./packages/react-simple-qr-code-scanner/ --tag beta
scripts.publish:alpha: pnpm i && nx build react-simple-qr-code-scanner && npm publish ./packages/react-simple-qr-code-scanner/ --tag alpha
